summary.span: 确定 对象的 XML 序列化格式。

span.span: Determines XML serialization format of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举可供序列化基础结构，并不打算用于公共用途。This enumeration is used by the serialization infrastructure only, and is not intended for public use. 实际设置序列化模式，创建应用程序配置文件，并设置[ <dateTimeSerialization>元素](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md)为适当的设置。To actually set the serialization mode, create an application configuration file, and set the [<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) to an appropriate setting. 有关配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[配置文件架构](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md)。For more information about configuration files, see [Configuration File Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md). 在版本 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET Framework 中，以及在版本 2.0 及更高版本时此属性设置为`Local`，对象格式始终设置为本地时间。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of .NET Framework, as well as in versions 2.0 and later when this property is set to `Local`, objects are always formatted as the local time. 即，序列化的数据中总是包含本地时区信息。That is, local time zone information is always included with the serialized data. 将此属性设置为`Local`以确保兼容性较旧版本的.Net Framework。Set this property to `Local` to ensure compatibility with older versions of the .Net Framework. 在版本 2.0 和更高版本的.NET Framework 中，此属性设置为`Roundtrip`对象将检查以确定它们是否位于本地、 UTC 或未指定的时区，并在序列化此类程序此信息的方式保留。In versions 2.0 and later of the .NET Framework, with this property set to `Roundtrip` objects are examined to determine whether they are in the local, UTC or an unspecified time zone, and are serialized in such a way that this information is preserved. 这是默认行为，建议的所有新应用程序不能与较旧版本的 framework。This is the default behavior and is recommended for all new applications that do not communicate with older versions of the framework.
